#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
#define MOD 1000000007
int main()
{
    int m,n,p,i,j,a,b,x;
	cin>>m>>n>>p;
	ll grid[m][n];
	memset(grid,0,sizeof(grid));
	for(x=0;x<p;x++)
	{
		cin>>a>>b;
		a--;
		b--;
		grid[a][b] = -1;
	}
	
	if(grid[0][0] == -1)
	{
		printf("0\n");
	    return 0;
	}
	for(i=0;i<m;i++)
	{
		if(grid[i][0] == 0)
		    grid[i][0] = 1;
		else
		    break;    
	}
	
	for(j=1;j<n;j++)
	{
		if(grid[0][j] == 0)
		    grid[0][j] = 1;
		else
		    break;    
	}
	
	for(i=1;i<m;i++)
	{
		for(j=1;j<n;j++)
		{
			if(grid[i][j] == -1)
			   continue;
			
			if(grid[i-1][j] > 0)
			   grid[i][j] = (grid[i][j] + grid[i-1][j] + MOD) % MOD;    
			if(grid[i][j-1] > 0)
			   grid[i][j] = (grid[i][j] + grid[i][j-1] + MOD) % MOD;    
		}
	}
	
	grid[m-1][n-1] = grid[m-1][n-1] % MOD;
	
	if(grid[m-1][n-1] < 0 )
	   printf("0\n");
	else
	   printf("%lld\n",grid[m-1][n-1]);   
	return 0;
}
